name: 竹内诗音
introduction: Shion Takeuchi, a screenwriter, has worked on more than a dozen projects. Inside Job, a new TV series she has created, will debut on Netflix October 22nd 2021. It is currently ranked number five on Netflix USA. She is also known for her writings including Long Live The Royals and Lost in Oz. The country is known for Shion’s amazing animation creations and storytelling. After writing the script for the cartoon network’s famous TV series Regular Show, Shion rose to prominence in 2010. We have provided more information about Instagram, Boyfriend name and Facebook. She is an American animator, storyboard artist and screenwriter, from Northborough, Massachusetts. After writing the script for the cartoon network’s famous television series Regular Show, Takeuchi rose to fame in 2010. Continue reading to learn more about Shion Takeuchi Wiki.编剧竹内诗翁(Shion Takeuchi)创作的新电视剧《Inside Job》于2021年10月22日在Netflix首播。目前它在Netflix USA上排名第五。她还因《Long Live the Royals》和《Lost in Oz》等作品而闻名。该国以施恩令人惊叹的动画创作和叙事而闻名。在为著名的卡通电视连续剧《Regular Show》撰写剧本后，施正荣在2010年声名鹊起。她是一名来自马萨诸塞州诺斯伯勒的美国动画师、故事板艺术家和编剧。在为著名的卡通电视连续剧《Regular Show》撰写剧本后，Shion Takeuchi于2010年声名鹊起。
